name: Reach The End (gamerblox)
description:
"Reach The End" is a very simple 2D infinite runner that was made as an introductory project to first teach myself how to make unity games for android devices. This game was also involved in one of my college software design courses at University of California, Irvine were I lead a group of 5 other individuals as we continued this project where it was left off.

Downloads below is an official updated windows port, and below that is an .apk if you want to install on an android device!

If you enjoyed this simple game, please don't be shy and leave a comment below! Thank you.
